verses.verse: And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>assembled<s%> all the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of the <S%H4256>companies<s%> that <S%H8334>served<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> by <S%H4256>course<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%>, and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds<s%>, and the rulers over all the <S%H7399>substance<s%> and <S%H4735>possessions<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> and of his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, with the <S%H5631>officers<s%>, and the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%>, even all the mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> of <S%H2428>valor<s%>, unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> stood <S%H6965>up<s%> upon his <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H251>me<s%>, my brethren, and my <S%H5971>people<s%>: as for <S%H3824>me<s%>, it was in my heart to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4496>rest<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and for the <S%H1916>footstool<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>; and I had made <S%H3559>ready<s%> for the <S%H1129>building<s%>.

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1129>me<s%>, Thou shalt not build a <S%H1004>house<s%> for my <S%H8034>name<s%>, because thou art a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and hast <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.

Howbeit <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H977>chose<s%> me out of all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> to be <S%H4428>king<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: for he hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> to be <S%H5057>prince<s%>; and in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>; and among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%> he took <S%H7521>pleasure<s%> in me to make me <S%H4427>king<s%> over all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

And of all my <S%H1121>sons<s%> (for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> me <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>), he hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> over <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H8010>me<s%>, Solomon thy <S%H1121>son<s%>, he shall <S%H1129>build<s%> my <S%H1004>house<s%> and my <S%H2691>courts<s%>; for I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> him to be my <S%H1121>son<s%>, and I will be his <S%H1>father<s%>.

And I will <S%H3559>establish<s%> his <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>, if he be <S%H2388>constant<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and mine <S%H4941>ordinances<s%>, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

Now <S%H5869>therefore<s%>, in the sight of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H8104>observe<s%> and <S%H1875>seek<s%> out all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; that ye may <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, and leave it for an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

And <S%H8010>thou<s%>, Solomon my <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3045>know<s%> thou the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with a <S%H8003>perfect<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> and with a <S%H2655>willing<s%> <S%H5315>mind<s%>; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1875>searcheth<s%> all <S%H3824>hearts<s%>, and <S%H995>understandeth<s%> all the <S%H3336>imaginations<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%>: if thou <S%H1875>seek<s%> <S%H4672>him<s%>, he will be found of <S%H5800>thee<s%>; but if thou forsake <S%H2186>him<s%>, he will cast thee off for <S%H5703>ever<s%>.

Take <S%H7200>heed<s%> <S%H3068>now<s%>; for Jehovah hath <S%H977>chosen<s%> thee to <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%>: be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and do <S%H6213>it<s%>.

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> of the <S%H1004>temple<s%>, and of the houses <S%H1597>thereof<s%>, and of the treasuries <S%H5944>thereof<s%>, and of the upper rooms <S%H6442>thereof<s%>, and of the inner <S%H2315>chambers<s%> <S%H1004>thereof<s%>, and of the place of the <S%H3727>mercy-seat<s%>;

and the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of all that he had by the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%>, for the <S%H2691>courts<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and for all the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, for the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, and for the <S%H214>treasuries<s%> of the dedicated <S%H6944>things<s%>;

also for the <S%H4256>courses<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and for all the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, and for all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5656>service<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>;

of <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the vessels of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, for all <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of every kind of <S%H5656>service<s%>; of silver for all the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>, for all <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of every kind of <S%H5656>service<s%>;

by <S%H4948>weight<s%> also for the <S%H4501>candlesticks<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H2091>thereof<s%>, of gold, by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H4501>thereof<s%>; and for the candlesticks of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, silver by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H4501>candlestick<s%> and for the <S%H5216>lamps<s%> <S%H5656>thereof<s%>, according to the use of every <S%H4501>candlestick<s%>;

and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H4635>showbread<s%>, for every <S%H7979>table<s%>; and <S%H3701>silver<s%> for the <S%H7979>tables<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>;

and the <S%H4207>flesh-hooks<s%>, and the <S%H4219>basins<s%>, and the <S%H4219>cups<s%>, of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%>; and for the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H3713>bowls<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>bowl<s%>; and for the <S%H3701>silver<s%> bowls by <S%H4948>weight<s%> for every <S%H3713>bowl<s%>;

and for the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> <S%H2212>refined<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> by <S%H4948>weight<s%>; and <S%H2091>gold<s%> for the <S%H8403>pattern<s%> of the <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, even the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%>, that spread <S%H6566>out<s%> their <S%H5526>wings<s%>, and covered the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

All <S%H7919>this<s%>, said David, have I been made to understand in <S%H3791>writing<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, even all the <S%H4399>works<s%> of this <S%H8403>pattern<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, Be <S%H2388>strong<s%> and of good <S%H553>courage<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3372>it<s%>: fear <S%H2865>not<s%>, nor be dismayed; for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, even my <S%H430>God<s%>, is with <S%H7503>thee<s%>; he will not fail <S%H5800>thee<s%>, nor forsake <S%H4399>thee<s%>, until all the work for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> be <S%H3615>finished<s%>.

And <S%H4256><s%>, behold, there are the courses of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, for all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and there shall be with thee in all manner of <S%H4399>work<s%> every <S%H5081>willing<s%> <S%H2451>man<s%> that hath <S%H5656>skill<s%>, for any manner of service: also the <S%H8269>captains<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> will be wholly at thy <S%H1697>commandment<s%>.
